entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
